remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，此方法仅支持的类型的密钥标识符子句。By default, this method only supports key identifier clauses of type . 你可以重写此方法以支持其他类型的密钥标识符子句。You can override this method to support other kinds of key identifier clauses. 此方法由 方向调用。This method is invoked by the method.
